channel.title: Exactly how would you add items to stores?
channel.description:
on a delta based server how do i add items to stores, can some one give me a example please? thank you so much
( i kno it's a stupid Q, but hey every one has to learn some time >_<)

item.title: Exactly how would you add items to stores?
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

I haven’t figured out what the 2’s are, but the first number after that is the item code, then the quantity of that item. Then it just keeps going ID, Amount, ID, Amount, etc…

Read full topic
item.source: Exactly how would you add items to stores?

item.title: Exactly how would you add items to stores?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Basically what the above people have said, you must use TAB’s for the spaces though, or it will not work.

Read full topic
item.source: Exactly how would you add items to stores?

item.title: Exactly how would you add items to stores?
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

shop = 2 Zaff’s Magic store 2 2 562 1000 560 1000 554 1000 555 1000 556 1000 557 1000 558 1000 566 1000 3053 20 4089 20 4091 20 4093 20 4095 20 4097 20

what exactly does this mean? i kno that it’s zaffs store. which ones the item id and is the other the amount?? cause when i delted a id and replace the amount too i get errors and how do i also change the price of the item?

Read full topic
